title: New Apartments in the new Westminster downtown area! 2 weeks free.
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Brand new modern apartments for rent in one of the newest and most coveted lifestyle hot spots in Westminster, Colorado.', 'The unique residences at Westminter Row offers all the luxury and amenities you desire.', ' Our great location, next to Alamo Draft House Cinema, shopping and dining experiences and US-36, are all just moments away from your front door.', 'When you’re a resident with us, there is no more compromising.', 'Think differently.', 'Think Westminster Row.', 'Call today to reserve your new apartment home.', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'Today', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', "- Assistive animals are not considered pets and are not subject to the same criteria.- A veterinarian certificate must be provided verifying the pet's age, weight, and current vaccinations.- A maximum of two (2) pets per apartment are allowed with a non-refundable fee for each pet.- One (1) Pet: $250.00 (non-refundable fee) plus a $300 refundable deposit.", 'Two (2) Pets: $500.00 (non-refundable fee) plus a $400.00 refundable deposit.', 'OR, a Deposit Insurance Program: The Deposit Insurance Program allows residents to pay a low monthly non-refundable charge in place of an Apartment or Pet Deposit.', 'Please ask your leasing consultant for more details.- A monthly pet fee/rent of $25.00 for one (1) pet and $50.00 for two (2) pets,  will be charged for the term of the lease while the pet(s) occupy the apartment.', 'Pets must be registered and are not allowed to visit.- A photograph must be provided for each pet.', 'Pets must be interviewed by management for temperament.- A dog under the age of 12 months will be accepted with a $1,000.00 one-time pet fee due before move-in.- Pet waste removal charge of $250.00 per occurrence if found not disposing of pet waste properly.- The following dog breeds are not allowed:  American Bull Terrier aka Pit Bull, Chow, Doberman Pinscher, Rottweiler, Staffordshire Terriers, and mixed breeds that include one of the listed restricted breeds.', 'Please contact the leasing office for full details.', 'Deposit:', 'Leasing options:', '6 months,9 months,9+ months,12 months,12+ months', 'Leasing notes:', 'Application fee:', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'Utilities Cost:', 'None', 'Laundry:', 'Parking type:', 'Parking notes:', 'None', 'Appliances:', 'Exterior:', 'Heating/cooling:', 'Wiring:', 'Facilities and Recreation:', 'Security and Access:', 'Views:', 'Additional features:', 'Offered by:', 'Westminster Row', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
